pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit the Gambin Model to Species Abundance Distributions // Fits unimodal and multimodal gambin distributions to species- abundance distributions from ecological data. 'gambin' is short for 'gamma-binomial'. The main function is fit_abundances(), which estimates the 'alpha' parameter(s) of the gambin distribution using maximum likelihood. Functions are also provided to generate the gambin distribution and for calculating likelihood statistics.
